entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
